title: WeatherStar 4000+: Weather Channel Simulator
author: adam_gyroscope
aiHeadline: WeatherStar 4000+: Because who doesn't want to relive the glory days of inaccurate weather predictions? Now you can simulate the entire Weather Channel experience in your browser, complete with dramatic music and overly enthusiastic meteorologists.

title: Human coders are still better than LLMs
author: longwave
aiHeadline: Human coders are still better than LLMs: Because apparently, even AI can't write code that doesn't throw errors half the time. Who knew?

title: Gurus of 90s Web Design: Zeldman, Siegel, Nielsen
author: panic
aiHeadline: Gurus of 90s Web Design: Zeldman, Siegel, Nielsen: Remember when web design meant marquee tags, animated GIFs, and frames? Well, the gurus who brought you that glorious era are back, and they're here to remind you that nostalgia isn't just for the 90s.

title: Run a C# file directly using dotnet run app.cs
author: soheilpro
aiHeadline: Run a C# file directly using dotnet run app.cs: Because who has time to build a project when you can just run a single file? Microsoft finally gives us the feature we've all been waiting for, 10 years too late.

title: Show HN: Typed-FFmpeg 3.0–Typed Interface to FFmpeg and Visual Filter Editor
author: lucemia51
aiHeadline: Show HN: Typed-FFmpeg 3.0–Typed Interface to FFmpeg and Visual Filter Editor: Because who doesn't want to spend hours tweaking video filters only to realize they still don't know what they're doing? Now with a typed interface, it's even more confusing!
